query:
INSERT INTO audio_recordings (customer_id, business_name, product_name, call_date, call_time, audio_url, transcription_text, transcription_status, analysis_summary, analysis_status, ai_tags, overall_status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES
(1, 'Tech Corp', 'AI Software', '2025-11-10', '09:30:00', 'https://example.com/audio1.mp3', 'Customer inquired about AI software features, pricing and implementation timeline. We introduced the core features including NLP, machine learning and data analytics. Customer is very interested in our solution and requested further technical demo and quote.', 'completed', 'Customer interested in AI software, needs further quote and technical demo', 'completed', '["interested", "demo_needed", "budget_sufficient"]'::jsonb, 'pending', NOW(), NOW()),
(2, 'Finance Services', 'Investment Advisor', '2025-11-10', '10:15:00', 'https://example.com/audio2.mp3', 'Discussed portfolio management, risk assessment and market analysis tools. Customer asked how the system handles complex investment strategies and real-time data updates. We demonstrated the real-time analysis capability and custom report functionality.', 'completed', 'Customer requests further investment plan and cost analysis', 'completed', '["investment_mgmt", "risk_assessment", "data_analysis"]'::jsonb, 'pending', NOW(), NOW()),
(3, 'Retail Store', 'Inventory Management System', '2025-11-10', '11:00:00', 'https://example.com/audio3.mp3', 'Inquired about system integration capability, cost and implementation timeline. Customer concerned about how the system integrates with existing POS and supply chain systems. We introduced API integration solution and data sync functionality.', 'completed', 'Customer satisfied with system features, needs demo and integration testing', 'completed', '["inventory_mgmt", "system_integration", "cost_effective"]'::jsonb, 'pending', NOW(), NOW()),
(4, 'Manufacturing', 'ERP System', '2025-11-10', '14:30:00', 'https://example.com/audio4.mp3', 'Discussed production process optimization, report functionality and data visualization. Customer asked how the system supports multi-factory management and cross-department collaboration. We introduced the modular design and customization solution.', 'completed', 'Customer needs customization solution, expected decision next week', 'completed', '["ERP", "production_mgmt", "customization"]'::jsonb, 'pending', NOW(), NOW()),
(5, 'Healthcare Institution', 'Patient Management System', '2025-11-10', '15:45:00', 'https://example.com/audio5.mp3', 'Inquired about system security, compliance and patient data privacy protection. Customer concerned about HIPAA and other healthcare data protection regulations compliance. We introduced system encryption, access control and audit log functionality.', 'completed', 'Customer concerned about data privacy, needs compliance certificate and security assessment', 'completed', '["healthcare_compliance", "data_security", "privacy_protection"]'::jsonb, 'pending', NOW(), NOW());
